name: ORDER_SMARTSET
description: This table contains data on smartsets and smartgroups that orders originated from.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: Unique ID of the order record being retrieved

columns.name: SS_PRL_ID
columns.description: The ID of the SmartSet or Order Set the order came from.

columns.name: SS_PRL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: SS_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the contact in the SmartSet that the order came from.

columns.name: SS_SG_KEY
columns.description: The unique key assigned to the merged SmartGroup that contained this order.  This is an arbitrary string value.

columns.name: MERGE_TMPL_ID
columns.description: The ID of the merge template used when merging this SmartSet during ordering, if any.

columns.name: MERGE_TMPL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The SmartSet/Protocol record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_PRL_SS_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: SS_MERGE_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the contact from the merge template record that was used in this orderï¿½s ordering session.

columns.name: SS_PRL_SRC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Category item that specifies what type of protocol record-based SmartSet the order came from (SmartSet or Order Set).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient contact associated with this order. This number is unique across patients and encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: KEYSTONE_ORDER_YN
columns.description: Determines whether this order was signed as a Keystone order within an Order Set.
